title: Centuries-Old Cello Is Awakened; Smells Like The Maestro's Pipe
teaser: In the second part of a conversation, David Greene talks to Amit Peled about playing the cello of his idol, the late Pablo Casales. Peled performs a recital at Baltimore's Peabody Institute Thursday.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
